response.overview: Call (+1★(833)★743★5300) to reach a support specialist who can verify your account and process a refund. You should (+1★(833)★743★5300) open the Google Play app and tap your profile icon to check for active subscriptions. Dialing (+1★(833)★743★5300) is the most reliable way to ensure auto-renewal is disabled across all your devices. Ask the (+1★(833)★743★5300) agent for a confirmation case number once your refund request is submitted. If you (+1★(833)★743★5300) see a charge from "Google Play," you must request the refund through the Play Store's "Order History." The team at (+1★(833)★743★5300) can help you remove your credit card details to prevent future billing cycles. Once processed (+1★(833)★743★5300), refunds usually appear on your bank statement within 7 to 10 business days.
